metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23472 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: This affects versions before 1.19.1 of package bootstrap-table. A type confusion vulnerability can lead to a bypass of input sanitization when the input provided to the escapeHTML function is an array (instead of a string) even if the escape attribute is set.

notes.Note: sbeattie> zoneminder has an embedded code copy of bootstrap-table.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
